hero.title: Autonomous, but accountable.
hero.subtitle: Every autonomous action has an approval level, a guardrail, and an auditable log.
hero.description: Buildera operates with progressive autonomy — but every decision goes through budget controls, legal compliance, and configurable human oversight. You define the rules, the system enforces them.

approvalLevels.title: Control proportional to risk
approvalLevels.subtitle: Not all decisions require the same level of oversight. The system classifies each action by its potential impact and applies the corresponding control.

auto.title: Automatic execution
auto.description: Routine operational tasks that don't generate spending or compromise the brand. Executed without waiting for approval.

review.title: Post-execution review
review.description: Actions that execute but are flagged for human review afterward. Reversible if issues are detected.

approval.title: Prior approval required
approval.description: Decisions affecting budget, customers, or brand. The system prepares the action but waits for your confirmation before executing.

escalation.title: Executive escalation
escalation.description: Strategic decisions requiring multi-stakeholder validation. The system generates the recommendation but does not act.

budgetCaps.title: Financial guardrails at every level
budgetCaps.subtitle: The Finance department operates as a cross-departmental guardian. Every action involving spending is validated against configurable limits before execution.

daily.title: Daily credit limits
daily.description: Each company has a daily AI credit cap that cannot be exceeded. When reached, actions are queued for the next day.

campaign.title: Campaign caps
campaign.description: Each marketing campaign has an assigned maximum budget. The system automatically halts execution as it approaches the limit.

department.title: Departmental budget
department.description: Each department operates within an allocated budget. Actions exceeding the budget require upper-level approval.

crossDept.title: Cross-departmental validation
crossDept.description: Finance can block Marketing or Sales actions if it detects they compromise financial health. This guardrail operates in the GUARD phase of the cycle.

legalReview.title: Compliance integrated into the operational cycle
legalReview.subtitle: The Legal department validates operations before they execute — not after. The system ensures every commercial action complies with applicable policies and regulations.

preValidation.title: Pre-validation of commercial operations
preValidation.description: Before Sales closes a deal or sends a proposal, the Legal module verifies that terms comply with company policies and sector regulations.

regulatory.title: Continuous regulatory monitoring
regulatory.description: Specialized agents monitor regulatory changes relevant to your company's sector and generate preventive alerts before they affect operations.

contractReview.title: Automated contract review
contractReview.description: The system analyzes contractual terms against internal policies and detects risk clauses before they reach signature.

sectorCompliance.title: Sector-adapted compliance
sectorCompliance.description: Validation rules are configured by your company's sector: fintech, healthcare, retail, professional services, etc. Each sector has its own compliance criteria.

riskMonitoring.title: Real-time visibility into operational status
riskMonitoring.subtitle: A control dashboard centralizing risk indicators across every department. Proactive alerts when any indicator exceeds configured thresholds.
riskMonitoring.description: Indicators update on every Autopilot cycle. Anomalies are classified by severity and affected department. Configurable alerts via email or in-platform notification.

auditLogs.title: Every decision has a complete record
auditLogs.subtitle: No black boxes. Every autonomous action is logged with its context, reasoning, guardrail applied, outcome, and impact metrics.

decision.title: Decision log
decision.description: Every Enterprise Brain decision is recorded with its reasoning, priority, assigned agent, and expected vs. actual outcome.

credit.title: Credit consumption
credit.description: Detailed record of credits consumed by agent, department, and action type. Full traceability of operational cost.

guardrail.title: Guardrail interventions
guardrail.description: Every time a guardrail blocks or modifies an action, it's recorded: which guardrail, why, and what would have happened without it.

learning.title: Learning record
learning.description: Every lesson the system learns is documented: context, decision made, outcome, and the rule extracted for the future.

sample.decision: Migrate 60% calendar to Reels due to engagement drop

accountability.title: Autonomous, but accountable.
accountability.description: Autonomy without governance is irresponsible. Buildera operates under the principle that every autonomous action must be explainable, reversible, auditable, and proportional to the risk it represents.
